title: Cities: Skylines launches on Stadia today, free for Pro members
content:
Google Stadia is adding Cities: Skylines today, and in a surprise, the game is a free addition to Stadia Pro!

moreâ€¦

The post Cities: Skylines launches on Stadia today, free for Pro members appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Google Stadia has just added support for Cities: Skylines, with the game available for free as a part of the Stadia Pro subscription.
